data.comment: The match is underway. Norwich have kicked-off.
Emiliano Buendia scores to make it 0-1 at Madejski Stadium.
In the minute 14, Goal! Michael Olise equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Ovie Ejaria with an assist there.
The first half has been concluded at Madejski Stadium.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Reading kick-off.
Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a first substitution, with Todd Cantwell replacing Josh Martin.
Kieran Dowell is on a sub for Marco Stiepermann for Norwich.
In the minute 55, Norwich have been given a penalty...
It's advantage Norwich in Reading as Teemu Pukki scores from the spot to make it 1-2.
Veljko Paunovic is making the team's first substitution at Madejski Stadium with Sam Baldock replacing Sone Aluko.
In the minute 67, Reading make their second substitution with Tomas Esteves replacing Alfa Semedo.
Tom McIntyre is replacing Tom Holmes for Reading at Madejski Stadium.
The home team have replaced Andy Rinomhota with Jayden Onen. This is the fourth substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
In the minute 83, At Madejski Stadium, Jayden Onen has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Daniel Farke is making the team's third substitution at Madejski Stadium with Jordan Hugill replacing Teemu Pukki.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team have replaced Kieran Dowell with Alexander Tettey. This is the fourth substitution made today by Daniel Farke.
